NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 136? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {179} from {StreamSphere} to {GameCast}, a flow of {160} from {GameCast} to {StreamSphere}, a flow of {141} from {StreamSphere} to {ChirpNet}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 63? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 86 and 119? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from GameCast to ChirpNet or from PictoGram to ChirpNet?
NC.A: The flow from {PictoGram} to {ChirpNet} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from GameCast to ChirpNet, from ChirpNet to StreamSphere, or from GameCast to StreamSphere?
NC.A: The flow from {GameCast} to {StreamSphere} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {FlickFlare}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {GameCast} and {StreamSphere}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc ChirpNet, Arc StreamSphere, Arc GameCast, Arc FlickFlare, Arc PictoGram}.
